column3:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
This well-meaning mentor would ask for your help with unfinished business.
Survey the designated areas and slay the anemone should it appear.
Deliver the anemone corpse to the well-meaning mentor.
Your travels have led you back to Slitherbough, I see. Your timing is fortuitous. Preparations for the anemone hunt are complete. If you are of a mind to join me, your aid would be most appreciated.
It was last seen in the southwestern region of Cleric. The hunt will prove difficult, however, as that is where the Children chose to build their spiders' nest.
Tread lightly, and do not hesitate to strike it down on sight. I only ask that you retrieve its corpse should you find it first.
You see no sign of the anemone. Perhaps you should search elsewhere.
You find the corpse of an animal, but there are no signs of a struggle. Perhaps it was killed with poison...
You are returned. I hope you had better luck than I.
<sigh> Would that there was another way, but the threat it posed to the Greatwood could not be ignored.
Mark my words: this <Emphasis>will not</Emphasis> happen again.
